name: P41
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated wide-angle camera mounted on garage, suburban home driveway and front yard at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. An unfamiliar dark sedan, license plate visible, tinted windows, parks in driveway. The vehicle approaches head-on, front license plate clearly visible, then turns to park. Fixed camera position, wide field of view covering driveway and street approach, slight barrel distortion at edges, Clear high-quality footage typical of daytime security camera recording. Realistic human motion, 15-second duration.
